trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Serialization.XpsSerializationPrintTicketRequiredEventArgs"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Serialization.XpsSerializationPrintTicketRequiredEventArgs"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: An object that specifies the scope of the <xref href="System.Printing.PrintTicket"></xref>.
Either the total number of pages or the number of documents in the print job.
trans-unit.target: 總頁數或列印工作中的文件數目。

trans-unit.source: Which applies depends on the scope of the <xref href="System.Printing.PrintTicket"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 這會套用範圍而定<xref href="System.Printing.PrintTicket"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Printing.PrintTicket"></xref> that is used in the writing operation.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定<xref href="System.Printing.PrintTicket"></xref>用於寫入作業。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Printing.PrintTicket"></xref> that defines how the printer handles a print job.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Printing.PrintTicket"> </xref>定義印表機的列印工作的處理方式。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates the scope of the <xref href="System.Printing.PrintTicket"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出的範圍<xref href="System.Printing.PrintTicket"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Serialization.PrintTicketLevel"></xref> value that indicates the scope of the <xref href="System.Printing.PrintTicket"></xref>.
Gets either the total number of pages or the number of documents in the print job.
trans-unit.target: 取得列印工作中的總頁數或文件數目。

trans-unit.source: Whether this property represents pages or documents depends on the scope (for example, single document or multiple documents) of the <xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket>.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性表示頁面或文件取決於<xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket>.</xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket>範圍 （例如，單一文件或多個文件）

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Int32> that represents the total number of pages or the number of documents.
